main event: One oval or egg-shaped object was observed in Beulah, Michigan on 22 October 1956.
interesting points: The object was aluminum colored with a row of blue lights along the bottom., It produced a hissing sound during the sighting., The sighting lasted for about 2 to 5 minutes., The object was observed visually and through a 30 power scope., The object disappeared very fast into the ENE direction.
witness description: Mr. Robert Sutton and confirmed by at least three other persons in the Benzie County area.
